hanzi-su-wiki:
鷹

Значения

Сокол, ястреб

Мнемоника

Используемый для охоты самец 鳥 сокола или ястреба. Вверху — прирученная человеком 亻, т.е. находящаяся под навесом 广 птица 隹.

Варианты

鹰

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Here we see the birdman relaxing in his cave with his favorite bird, the hawk.
humanum_full_description_en: From " bird " to " Q " sound, it is a general term for eagle birds. Tang Bai Juyi's "Flying the Eagle": "The wings of an eagle are as fast as the wind, and the claws are as sharp as a cone." Ming Li Shizhen, "Compendium of Materia Medica-Three Birds-Eagle": "The eagle goes out of the Liaohai Sea, followed by the North and Northeast Hu. The northerners tend to take young ones, and the southerners use them as a matchmaker in August and September. They are the birds of the violent."
humanum_short_description_en: From " bird ", "䧹" sound, is the general term for eagle birds.
humanum_full_description: 從「鳥」，「䧹」聲，是鷹科鳥類的通稱。唐白居易〈放鷹〉：「鷹翅疾如風，鷹爪利如錐。」明李時珍《本草綱目‧禽三‧鷹》：「鷹出遼海者上，北地及東北胡者次之。北人多取雛養之，南人八九月以媒取之。乃鳥之疏暴者。」
humanum_short_description: 從「鳥」，「䧹」聲，是鷹科鳥類的通稱。

  • ⿸ Surround from upper left

①鳥類的一科，猛禽類，嘴鉤曲，趾有鉤爪，十分銳利，捕食小獸和其他鳥類，獵人可馴養幫助打獵：鷹犬。鷹隼(鷹和隼，喻兇猛或兇猛的人)。鷹視狼步(喻人舉止兇狠)。
鷹犬 [ yīng quǎn ]: hawks and hounds; (fig.) running dogs; hired thugs

從「 鳥 」，「 䧹 」聲，是鷹科鳥類的通稱。唐白居易〈放鷹〉：「鷹翅疾如風，鷹爪利如錐。」明李時珍《本草綱目‧禽三‧鷹》：「鷹出遼海者上，北地及東北胡者次之。北人多取雛養之，南人八九月以媒取之。乃鳥之疏暴者。」
From " bird" to " Q" sound, it is a general term for eagle birds. Tang Bai Juyi's "Flying the Eagle": "The wings of an eagle are as fast as the wind, and the claws are as sharp as a cone." Ming Li Shizhen, "Compendium of Materia Medica-Three Birds-Eagle": "The eagle goes out of the Liaohai Sea, followed by the North and Northeast Hu. The northerners tend to take young ones, and the southerners use them as a matchmaker in August and September. They are the birds of the violent."

鷹字的基本解释

鷹
yīng
见“鹰”。

鷹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīng］
［《廣韻》於陵切，平蒸，影。］
“鹰1”的繁体字。
鸟类的一科。一般指鹰属的鸟类。上嘴呈钩形，颈短，脚部有长毛，足趾有长而锐利的爪。性凶猛，捕食小兽及其他鸟类。

鷹字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷹； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1501第18
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?於陵切，音膺。【玉篇】鷙鳥。李時珍曰：鷹以膺擊，故謂之鷹。陸佃云：一歲曰黃鷹，二歲曰鴘鷹，鴘次赤也。三歲曰鶬鷹，今通謂之角鷹，頂有毛角微起。一曰題肩，一曰征鳥，一曰爽鳩。【左傳·昭十七年】爽鳩氏。【註】鷹也，一作鶆鳩。【爾雅·釋鳥】鷹鶆鳩。又【本草】虎鷹，翼廣丈餘，能搏虎。【裴氏新書】鷹在衆鳥閒，若睡寐然，故積怒而後全剛生焉。詩大雅：維師尚父，時維鷹揚。言其武之奮揚也。【正字通】鷹雄形小雌體大，生於窟者好眠，巢於木者常立，雙骹長者起遲，六翮短者飛急。禮月令，季夏，鷹乃學習。註：鶵學飛。又季秋，鷹乃祭鳥。註：欲食鳥，先殺鳥不食。毛氏曰：本作䧹，後人加鳥字，不知䧹已从隹矣。徐鍇曰：鷹隨人指縱，故从人。

鷹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鷹字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīng］
["Guangyun" Yuling cut, flat steamed, shadow. ]
Traditional characters for "鹰1".
A family of birds. Generally refers to birds of the genus Eagle. The upper mouth is hook-shaped, the neck is short, the feet have long hair, and the toes have long, sharp claws. Sexual fierce, prey on small animals and other birds.
eagle

[Hai Collection] [Birds Department] 　 Eagle; Kangxi strokes: 23; Page number: page 1501, 18
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Yu Lingqie, the sound is falsified. 【Jade articles】Birds of prey. Li Shizhen said: The eagle falsifies, so it is called the eagle. Lu Dianyun: One year old is called a yellow eagle, two years old is called a Yingying, and when he is two years old, he is called a yellow eagle. At the age of three, it is called a eagle. Today it is called a horned eagle, with hairy horns on the top. One is the question of the shoulder, the other is the sign of the bird, and the other is the cool dove. [Zuo Zhuan·17th Year of Zhao] Shuangjiu's family. 【Note】Eagle, one is a dove. 【Erya·Shiniao】Eagle Dove. Also 【Materia Medica】The tiger eagle has broad wings and can fight the tiger. [Pei's new book] The eagle is idle among the birds, and if it sleeps soundly, it will become angry and just give birth. Shi Daya: Wei Shi Shangfu, Shi Wei Yingyang. Yan Qiwu also promotes. [Zhengzitong] The male-shaped eagle has a large female, and those born in a cave sleep well, those who nest in a wood stand often, the elders with double-patterns rise late, and those with short six-horns fly fast. Li Yueling, Ji Xia, Ying Nai learn. Note: Feng Xuefei. In the autumn season, the eagle is a sacrifice to the bird. Note: If you want to eat birds, kill the birds first. Mao's said: This is Qi, and later generations add the word "Bird", but I don't know that Qi has already started from "隹矣."
